text: pĕnkār prah̄lād kæ̀ mnus̄ʹy̒ h̄rụ̄x thī̀ reā dị̂ h̄ı̂ wa ḥīyˌ kæ̀ chāy khn h̄nụ̀ng cāk phwk k̄heā h̄ı̂ teụ̄xn s̄ảthạb mnus̄ʹy̒ læa cæ̂ng k̄h̀āwdī kæ̀ brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā ẁā thæ̂cring s̄ảh̄rạb phwk k̄heā nận ca dị̂ rạb tảh̄æǹng xạn s̄ūngs̄̀ng ṇ thī̀ phracêā k̄hxng k̄heā brrdā p̄hū̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā kl̀āw ẁā thæ̂cring nī̀ khụ̄x nạk māyākl xỳāng næ̀nxn
